page.title: 20*** HASWELL IN THE NEWS **
page.content: {A reporter from the Peterlee Times {said that Haswell is small and smelly. {I think that reporter took a {photograph of a place being repaired. {Three people I know wrote in reply. Dear Sir, When I read the Peterlee Times I was shocked to hear you calling our place a dump. I know it has it's disadvantages but which place hasn't. I agree it can be dull. There is hardly anywhere to play but it is safe for young people with not many cars. There are not many shops but there are a fish shop,V.G,a mart and a butchers shop. Our village is peaceful and quiet.There are lots of places to walk. It has a church,chapel and a small school. The disadvantage is that there is always paper flying about after the Mart. Yours Faithfully Donna Jenkins.
